price: Sũ ne waɗanda ke cẽwa "Kada ku ciyar a kan wanda ke wurin Manzon Allah har su wãtse," alhali kuwa taskõkin sammai da ƙasa ga Allah suke kuma amma munãfukai bã su fahimta.
arabic: هُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ لَا تُنفِقُواْ عَلَىٰ مَنۡ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ حَتَّىٰ يَنفَضُّواْۗ وَلِلَّهِ خَزَآئِنُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: humu alladhīna yaqūlūna lā tunfiqū ʿalā man ʿinda rasūli al-lahi ḥattā yanfaḍḍū walillahi khazāinu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walākinna al-munāfiqīna lā yafqahūna
